lines.text: Hey, you're hurt.
Lady, I'm fucking dead.
[last lines]
Roger, I think this is the end of a beautiful friendship.

[He shuts the porno mag the clerk's being reading]
Sorry to interrupt your erection.

[to a dead body]
You are under arrest. You have the right to remain disgusting.

[to Rebecca]
The most important thing for me to do right now is to nail whoever did this to me. You understand that, don't you?
Personally rip his heart out with my bare hands, Roger. Hold the heart in the palm of my hand and we'll watch it stops beating together.
That's nice, Doug, but let's find him first.
That's okay. Don't get up.
Get him, get him, get him!
[Mr. Thule gets into a gunfight with Roger but dies]
I told you not to get up.
You know, the weird thing is, I feel fine. I feel like I could run in the Boston Marathon.
Hey, no, you couldn't, Roger. It's not opened to dead people.
You think they'd check?
Oh, they're very strict now.
So what color did you get?

[looks at lipstick]
Uh, mulberry wine.
That's a good choice.

[effeminately]
Brings out your eyes.
Roger, you were underwater in that Jacuzzi for five straight minutes.
That's right, I was.
Can you teach my girlfriend how to do that?
Roger, maybe you ought to get yourself a change of clothes. Being dead isn't something you should advertise.
I might have something in my closet.
Something for that unexpected overnight guest, Miss James?
From an ex-boyfriend, Mr. Bigelow. A very ex.
Life and death are both expressions of the same eternal spirit.
You oughta write fortune cookies, pal.
This little piggy's going to market.
[a reanimated cow walks out of the freezer]
How do you fight this thing?
Maybe you can drown it in A1 sauce.
You remember when we were in training? They always told us, "You can't be a good cop if you're a dead cop." Here's your chance to prove them wrong. You're good and you're dead.
I'm good and I'm dead.
God wants us to live forever. And even if he doesn't, you could always buy him off.
What's your gimmick, Arthur?
No gimmick. Eternal life.
Bullshit.
Well, I know that it's absurd, impossible, but aside from the proof of my being here, I've planned for you a little graphic demonstration.
You're dead, McNab. You're even deader than I am.
Doug, you're alive.
He can't understand a word you've said, Roger. He's been brain-dead too long, which means he's mindless and totally obedient. Kill this guy, would you?
Kill this guy, would you?
Hi, Doug. Welcome to Zombieland.
Roger, he said I should... He said I should hurt you. But I'm gonna hurt him.
Kill that guy, would you?
Kill him. Why can't you kill him?
Shut up, you old fart!
